pages:
STATE OF MICHIGAN
GRETCHEN WHITMER DEPARTMENT OF LICENSING AND REGULATORY AFFAIRS ORLENE HAWKS
GOVERNOR LANSING DIRECTOR
April 12, 2019
Jeremy Mulvany
Eaton County Youth Facility
822 Courthouse Drive
Charlotte, MI 48813
RE: License #: CO230201104
Eaton County Youth Facility
822 Courthouse Drive
Charlotte, MI 48813
Dear Mr. Mulvany:
This letter is a follow-up to the Department’s findings regarding the interim inspection
conducted at your facility on 02/28/2019. The purpose of this inspection was to determine
compliance with applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules for Court Operated
Residential Care Facility .
The violations that were found are:
R 400.10187 Housing population; rated capacity.
The population in housing or living units shall not exceed the
rated capacity.
The facility was over its rated capacity 32 days in the last year.
This is a repeat violation cited during the 2018 Renewal Inspection with a CAP
accepted on 3/19/18.
Due to the violations identified in the report, a written corrective action plan is required.
The corrective action plan is due 15 days from the date of this letter and must include the
following:
 How compliance with each rule will be achieved.
 Who is directly responsible for implementing the corrective action for each
violation.
611 W. OTTAWA  P.O. BOX 30664  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov/lara  517-335-1980

 Specific time frames for each violation as to when the correction will be
completed or implemented.
 For any repeat violations, include an assessment of why the previous
corrective action plan was ineffective.
 How continuing compliance will be maintained once compliance is
achieved.
 The signature of the responsible party and a date.
Please contact me with any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need
to speak to someone immediately, please contact the local office at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Rorie Dodge-Garnaat, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
235 Grand, Ste 1305
P.O. Box 30650
Lansing, MI 48909
(517) 899-6024
Enclosures
